mapper.select: SELECT id, code, name_cn, name_en, by_the_piece, piece_upper_carry, total_upper_carry, small_cargo_carry, big_cargo_carry, bulky_code FROM by_the_piece_method where id = #{id}
SELECT id, code, name_cn, name_en, by_the_piece, piece_upper_carry, total_upper_carry, small_cargo_carry, big_cargo_carry, bulky_code FROM by_the_piece_method where 1 = 1 order by id desc
